text: Generate an image of a quirky green frog amusingly dressed with swimming goggles on. The scene is quite unusual, picturing the frog in a human-like situation: It's sitting at a modern-style desk, in front of a computer screen, with a cup of coffee by its side. The work station has a comfortable chair, a keyboard, and a mouse. A soft light from a desk lamp illuminates the workspace. Outside the nearby window, one can see it is a sunny day.
